posts.post_content: N172 Old Judge Patton-Minneapolis-PSA 5MK-$600.00 delivered. Strong image.Check or money order only. No electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. As always, "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations or requests for additional information. Please direct all correspondence to my email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Please visit my newly updated website below for larger scans and additional cards. Thank you for looking.
beautiful image Ed......good luck with the sale.....
I would highly recommend checking out the cards for sale on Ed's web page )(link at the bottom of the original post).  Lots of neat stuff!!!
